iluppukadawayi polis wasame anthonipuram kalabada pradeshaya di nithi wirodhi lesa indiyawe sita dhiwara bottu mangin meratata genwa kalabada pradeshaye sukshama lesa sangawa thabana lada kaha kilogram 251k ada (24) dina athadanguwata ganimata wishesha karya balakaya samath wi thibenawa.kaha thogaya wadidura wimarshana katayuthu sandaha iluppukadawayi polis sthanaya wetha bhara di thibena bawayi wartha wenne.wishesha karya balakaya mema wasara thula me dakwa watalim 08k sidukara sakakaruwan 11k samanga rupiyal dekoti hata lakshayakata adhika watinakamakin yuth kaha kilogram 5228k athadanguwata gena thibena bawa sandahan.

jathyanthara mulya aramudale samipastha naya pahasukam wadasatahanehi ilakka sapuralima 2010 agosthu masaya dakwa hariyakarawa sidukara atha. 2010 juni masaya awasanaya wana wita dakwa athi siyaluma karyasadhana nirnayaka sapura atha. 2010 samastha mulya warshayata adala wayakirim sahitha ayawaya 2010 juli 09 wanada sammatha karana lada athara, eya da.de.ni.yen siyayata 8 k wana ayawaya paratharayakata galapena se sakasa atha.
